content.description:
Not a beginner route!  Fall from top could lead to serious injury 

  Route details still in development, I have sent on toprope but don't remember much beta
content.protection: multiple pads and spotter if unsure of ability
content.location: left side of right most boulder of the "Fire Down Below" boulders.  All holds for Baby Jaws are off

climbs.name: In the Tree, Part of the Tree

content.description: Obvious crack that starts with hand jams and widens out. Many different ways you can do it. There are holds on the side that make it easier but you can easily make it harder than V1 if you only use the crack
content.protection: Bush makes it a bad landing so better not to fall if you don't have a spotter
content.location: Crack to the right of Bushwacker

content.description: Crux is 1st 2 moves, Gaston with left, right hand/footmatch and right to side pull
content.location: Left most boulder of the 3 “fire down below” boulders

content.description: Climb big jugs to the top, similar to “Jaws” at horsepens 40
content.protection: Not a beginner route. Top rope from fire tower if unsure of ability 1st. Fall from top could lead to serious injury
content.location: Right side of right most fire down below boulder

content.description: Boulders directly below the firetower (lakeside). U can create a toprope anchor off the legs of the firetower to work problems safely
